profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on leading the development of generative AI solutions and making information accessible from unstructured data. While it mentions 'generative AI solutions', it doesn't explicitly detail software engineering tasks like integration into existing systems or MLOps. The emphasis is on the AI development itself, suggesting a specialization in GenAI rather than a balanced engineering role. There's also a mention of business purpose and supporting employees, indicating a strategic application of GenAI.
